response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000 for the product. This amount reflects its true worth while allowing us both to benefit from this exchange. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation of the product. Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful collaboration.", "product_price": 1200000}
